definition: to return/to go back to/to give back to/(of a responsibility) to be taken care of by/to belong to/to gather together/(used between two identical verbs) despite/to marry (of a woman) (old)/division on the abacus with a one-digit divisor
towards/to face/to turn towards/direction/to support/to side with/shortly before/formerly/always/all along/(suffix) suitable for .../oriented to ...

sentences.english: That day Fuchida gave his heart to Christ.
sentences.chinese: 從那天始，淵田歸向基督。

sentences.english: As I spend time in intercession, I will see more conversions.
sentences.chinese: 當我花時間代禱時，會看見更多人歸向主。

sentences.english: Arguments do not bring people to God. This is a good example for the evangelists.
sentences.chinese: 爭辯不能把人歸向主，福傳者學習的榜樣。

sentences.english: You must turn from Satan to God.
sentences.chinese: 你必須從撒但權下歸向上帝。

sentences.english: May those who fear you turn to me, those who understand your statutes.
sentences.chinese: 願敬畏你的人歸向我，他們就知道你的法度。

sentences.english: I have considered my ways and have turned my steps to your statutes.
sentences.chinese: 我思想我所行的道，就轉步歸向你的法度。

sentences.english: Where the Sages go to, he is able to unite all.
sentences.chinese: 聖人歸向他，天下就會統一。

sentences.english: Third, you must turn from the power of Satan to God.
sentences.chinese: 第三，你必須從撒但權下歸向上帝。

sentences.english: The ultimate goal of spiritual giftedness and fruitfulness is to point men and women to God.
sentences.chinese: 屬靈恩賜和果子的終極目標是使人歸向上帝。

sentences.english: Then will I teach transgressors thy ways; and sinners shall be converted unto thee.
sentences.chinese: 我必將你的道路指教有過犯的人，罪人必迴轉歸向你。

sentences.english: Jesus calls us not only to come to him, but to go for him.
sentences.chinese: 耶穌不單呼召我們歸向他，更要去傳他。

sentences.english: Let those that fear thee turn unto me, and those that have known thy testimonies.
sentences.chinese: 願敬畏你的人歸向我，他們就知道你的法度。

sentences.english: Turn ye unto him from whom the children of Israel have deeply revolted.
sentences.chinese: 以色列人哪，你們深深的悖逆耶和華，現今要歸向他。

sentences.english: And there came a messenger to David, saying, The hearts of the men of Israel are after Absalom.
sentences.chinese: 有人報告大衛說，以色列人的心都歸向押沙龍了。

sentences.english: I thought on my ways, and turned my feet unto thy testimonies.
sentences.chinese: 我思想我所行的道，就轉步歸向你的法度。

sentences.english: Have you turned from the power of Satan to God?
sentences.chinese: 你從撒但權下歸向上帝了嗎？

definition: virtue has its rewards (idiom); one good turn deserves another
to convert to (a religion)/to rely upon/refuge/mainstay
to transmit Buddhist teaching/chakram or chakka (throwing disk)
to abandon suffering and obtain happiness (Buddhism)
displaying fully/developing to the greatest extent
